00001 /**
00002  *  @file reflect.hpp
00003  *
00004  *  This class defines the macros and types used to implement
00005  *  an REFLECT interface.
00006  *
00007  */
00008 #ifndef _BOOST_REFLECT_VTABLE_HPP_
00009 #define _BOOST_REFLECT_VTABLE_HPP_
00010 #include <boost/preprocessor/list/for_each.hpp>
00011 #include <boost/preprocessor/seq/for_each.hpp>
00012 #include <boost/preprocessor/stringize.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/reflect/reflect.hpp>
00014 
00015 namespace boost { namespace reflect {
00016 
00017 #ifndef DOXYGEN
00018     template<typename T>
00019     struct vtable_base{ };
00020 #endif
00021 
00022     struct mirror_interface;
00023 
00024     /**
00025      *  @brief Contains functors defined by InterfaceDelegate for each reflected member of T
00026      *
00027      *  Use the @ref BOOST_REFLECT_ANY(NAME,INHERITS,MEMBERS) to define the vtable for your
00028      *  type.
00029      */
00030     template<typename T, typename InterfaceDelegate = boost::reflect::mirror_interface>
00031     class vtable {};
00032 
00033 } } // namespace boost::reflect
00034 
00035 #define PUBLIC_BASE( r, data, elem )  boost::reflect::vtable<elem,data>,
00036 #define DEFINE_MEMBER( r, data, elem ) \
00037   struct BOOST_PP_CAT( __reflect__, elem) : \
00038     public InterfaceDelegate::template calculate_type<BOOST_TYPEOF(&reflect_definition_class::elem)>::type  \
00039   {  \
00040       typedef typename InterfaceDelegate::template calculate_type<BOOST_TYPEOF(&reflect_definition_class::elem)>::type base_type;  \
00041       using base_type::operator=;\
00042       static const char* name() { return BOOST_PP_STRINGIZE(data); } \
00043       template<typename Type, typename AssignType> \
00044       static void get_member_ptr( AssignType v ) {  v = &Type::elem; } \
00045   } elem;
00046 
00047 #define BOOST_REFLECT_BASE BOOST_PP_SEQ_NIL
00048 #define BOOST_REFLECT_ANY( NAME, INHERITS, MEMBERS ) \
00049 BOOST_REFLECT( NAME, INHERITS, MEMBERS ) \
00050 namespace boost { namespace reflect { \
00051 template<typename InterfaceDelegate > \
00052 struct vtable<NAME,InterfaceDelegate> :BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOR_EACH( PUBLIC_BASE, InterfaceDelegate, INHERITS ) vtable_base<vtable<NAME,InterfaceDelegate> > { \
00053     typedef NAME reflect_definition_class; \
00054     BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOR_EACH( DEFINE_MEMBER, NAME, MEMBERS ) \
00055 }; \
00056 \
00057 } } 
00058 
00059 
00060 #endif
